mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.code AS "code", a.total AS "total", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remark AS "remark", a.text_a AS "textA", a.text_b AS "textB", a.text_c AS "textC", a.order_date AS "orderDate", a.saler AS "saler.id", a.customer AS "customer.id"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sams_order( id, name, code, total, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remark, text_a, text_b, text_c, order_date, saler, customer ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{code}, #{total}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remark}, #{textA}, #{textB}, #{textC}, #{orderDate}, #{saler.id}, #{customer.id} )
